attributes.action: MPs may not hold any other than that of an MP
attributes.additional_details: I want my MP to represent ME and no one else other than their other constituents
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that representing the interests of approximately 92,000 constituents is a full time job, and as such members of Parliament should be required to not hold any other paid positions of any kind for the duration of their membership.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban MPs from having second jobs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600866
